description: This Java class 'EventMapper' handles conversions between different representations of event data: mapping DTOs to entity objects and vice versa, including utility methods for handling event tags.

classes.name: EventMapper
classes.description: A Spring component responsible for converting between Event data transfer objects and Event entity objects, and formatting event tags.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts an EventDto to an Event entity, mapping fields and converting tags to a comma-separated string.

methods.name: updateEntity
methods.description: Updates an existing Event entity with data from an EventDto, including tags conversion.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Creates an EventResponseDto from an Event entity, including converting tags from string to list and adding attendance count.

methods.name: tagsToString
methods.description: Converts a list of tags into a comma-separated string, trimming whitespace and filtering out empty strings.

methods.name: stringToTags
methods.description: Converts a comma-separated string of tags into a list of trimmed, non-empty strings.
